Board of Directors & Staff - Camp New York Please ensure Javascript is enabled for purposes of website accessibility Skip to content Request a Guide About About Us Board of Directors & Staff CONY Hall of Fame & CONY Fellows Job Postings News Events CONY Members Support Camp Good Days Blog Hot Deals Member Center Affiliate Members Member Enrollment Marketing Opportunities Programs COVID-19 Resources Join Today Membership Benefits Member Enrollment Member Login Find a Campground Board of Directors & Staff Established in 1963, Campground Owners of New York, Inc. (CONY) is a for-profit trade association dedicated to the promotion, growth, improvement, and development of independently owned campgrounds in New York State. Two full-time staff persons manage the day-to-day operations of the association. The board of directors is comprised of campground owners or managers representing designated regions across the entire state, plus an executive committee of campground operators. Office location and correspondence: 100 Saratoga Village Blvd, Ste 37S Malta, New York 12020 info@campnewyork.com , 585-586-4360 Staff Emily Simmons President & CEO 585-586-4360 emily@campnewyork.com Ann Flach Marketing & Communications Manager 585-586-4360, ext 2 ann@campnewyork.com Board of Directors (2024-2025) Chairman: Matt Anderson Camp Chautauqua Stow, NY mda1223@yahoo.com Executive Committee Chair 1 st Vice Chair: Vacant 2 nd Vice Chair: Nina Latello Sleepy Hollow Lake Resort Akron, NY sleepyhollowlake@yahoo.com Marketing Committee Chair 3 rd Vice Chair: Patty Jarnot Dream Lake Campground Warsaw, NY patty@dreamlakecampground.com Governance Committee Chair Immediate Past Chair: Scott Sherwood Spruce Row Campground & RV Park Ithaca, NY sprucerow1@gmail.com Executive Committee Member Treasurer: Edward Marden Camp Bell Campground Campbell, NY ed@campbellcampground.com Executive Committee Member Secretary: Bryan Schaefer Jones Pond Campground & RV Park Angelica, NY Â bryan@jonespond.com Executive Committee Member Regional Directors Chautauqua-Allegheny: John Tinelli Triple R Camping Resort & Trailer Sales Franklinville, NY Counties: Allegany, Cattaraugus, Chautauqua. Greater Niagara: Max Han Red Rock Ponds RV Resort Holley, NY max@redrockponds.com Counties: Erie, Genesee, Niagara, Orleans, Wyoming. Alternate Director: Finger Lakes: Randy Case Grants' Vacation Park Fair Haven, NY racase49@gmail.com Counties: Cayuga, Chemung, Cortland, Livingston, Monroe, Onondaga, Ontario, Schuyler, Seneca, Steuben, Tioga, Tompkins, Wayne, Yates. Alternate Director: 1000 Islands-Seaway/Eastern Lake Ontario: Trisa Miller Brennan Beach RV Resort Pulaski, NY trisa_miller@equitylifestyle. com Counties: Jefferson, Oswego, northern St. Lawrence (all locations northwest of US Route 11). Alternate Director: The Adirondacks: Cathy Dunlap Old Forge Camping Resort Old Forge, NY Counties: Clinton, Essex, Franklin, Hamilton, Lewis, Warren, northern Herkimer (all locations north of the Intersection of Routes 365 & 8), southern St. Lawrence (all locations southeast of US Route 11). Capital-Saratoga: Mandy Duncan Lee's Park Campground Saratoga Springs, NY info@leespark.com Counties: Albany, Rensselaer, Saratoga, Schenectady, Washington Alternate Director: Jared Foro, Whispering Pines Campsites & RV Park, Greenfield Center, NY. The Catskills: Jerry Schroader Brookside Campground Catskill, NY jerry@brooksidecampgrounds.com Counties: Delaware, Greene, Sullivan, western Ulster (all locations west of Interstate 87), and southern Schoharie (all locations southeast of Interstate 88). Alternate Director: Hudson Valley/Long Island: John Forman Sylvan Lake Beach Park Hopewell Junction, NY Counties: Columbia, Dutchess, Orange, Putnam, Rockland, Westchester, Suffolk, and eastern Ulster (all locations east of Interstate 87). Discover nature, explore the wild. Welcome to The Oaks – Inverness RV Park.  This serene property is a retreat nestled on 16 acres of Olde Florida and filled with natural beauty.  Experience the tranquility of this park with its fresh ponds & leisure walking trails. Start your morning with the fresh aroma of coffee and immerse yourself with us for our planned events & activities. The Oaks offers the perfect blend of comfort & nature, making it the ultimate destination for your next getaway. Reserve Your Site Get in touch The Oaks – Inverness A Place to Unwind Come & stay on one of our 29 RV sites.  Pick your perfect spot to plug in.  Whether your spot is with a water view or nestled under a beautiful oak tree.  We have plenty of space to feel secluded.  Come & sit under the trees, away from the rest and back in Olde Florida. Find Out More On Site Laundry Public Bathroom & Showers Rec Hall Walking Trail Loop (0.25 miles) Quiet Location Stay Immerse Yourself Park Activities Enhance your stay by indulging in a selection of carefully curated park activities that are scheduled throughout the month. Ask us about activities that will be happening during your stay. Pet Farm Animals Bingo Bird Watching Bonfire Nights Nearby Sports & Recreation Horseback Riding Airboat Tours Fishing Crystal Water Springs Valued Experience Where amenities are included. Amenities such as WiFi & Cable are included with the cost of your stay.  Click below to see the complete list of Amenities we have to offer at The Oaks – Inverness. About Us - Red Oak Skip to content Red Oak Home Resort Map Lodging RVs Recreation Contact Us Make a Reservation Home Resort Map Lodging RVs Recreation Contact Us Make a Reservation At Red Oak Resort & RV Park, we are... At Red Oak Resort we are passionate about the great outdoors and making memories with those closest to you. We strive to accommodate all guests with a truly unique experience at the Lake of The Ozarks. Red Oak Resort is a family owned and operated business that provides a variety of camping, vacation, and nightly rental accommodations. Everything from RV sites to cabins, condos, houses, and motel rooms. Amenities include an outdoor pool, playground and , “Stewart’s” located on Boat Dock C, boat ramp access, boat slip rentals, dry storage, on-site convenience store with Wi-Fi access, and more! Come visit us and see why Red Oak Resort continues to be a popular destination at Lake of the Ozarks! Find Accomodations Our Campsite Memories to last a lifetime Play a round of tennis, take a dive in the pool, or fish lakeside! Red Oak Resort & RV Park has something for everyone to enjoy! Find Activities Red Oak Home Blog About Us Accomodations Recreation Contact Us Rules & Guidelines Privacy Policy 524 Recreation Row, Camdenton, MO 65020 info@redoakresortrvpark.com 573-873-9400 573-873-3982 © 2025 Red Oak

Discover nature, explore the wild. Welcome to The Oaks – Inverness RV Park.  This serene property is a retreat nestled on acres of Olde Florida and filled with natural beauty.  Experience the tranquility of this park with plenty of space between lots for all size of rigs that are shaded with full hookups. Start your morning with fresh coffee made every morning at our Rec Center and plan your day to either relax with us or head out to the nearby attractions.  The Oaks offers the perfect blend of comfort & nature, making it the ultimate destination for your next getaway. Reserve Your Site Get in touch The Oaks – Inverness RV Park in Florida RV Park in Florida A Place to Unwind Come & stay at our gated park on one of our shaded full hookup RV sites.  Pick your perfect spot to plug in.  Our lots can service 30 & 50 AMP and rigs of all sizes.  We have pull throughs and spots with a water view.  Our bathrooms, showers, and the laundry facilities are renovated. Come & sit under the trees or jump in the pool, away from the rest and back in Olde Florida. Find Out More On Site Laundry Public Bathroom & Showers Rec Hall Walking Trail Loop (0.25 miles) Quiet Location Pool Clubhouse Gated Stay Immerse Yourself In Activities The Oaks is conveniently located near activities and attractions.  We are just 10 miles from the highway (I-75) and about 45min from the Crystal River, FL shore – which is the only place in the U.S. to swim with manatees.  We are centrally located to Ocala, The Villages, Gulf of America and less than an hour from Disney.  We’re surrounded by crystal water springs like Rainbow Springs, Three Sister Springs and The Crack.  But, just up the road there is plenty of family friendly activities like Horseback riding, Airboat Tours, Fishing and Kayaking. There’s plenty to do right on camp grounds and we’re excited to have you! HOME RATES AMENITIES IMAGES REVIEWS BOOK NOW! Home Ron Heaton 2025-07-07T10:59:46-04:00 Breezy Oaks RV Park 55+ A Bushnell FL RV Park 55+ Pet-Friendly RV Resort… View Our NEW Low Rates! Serene countryside setting surrounded by the beautiful Withlacoochee State Forest… We are a Bushnell, FL RV Park with updated amenities, complimentary Wi-Fi & Cable (in some areas of the park), a friendly and 24/7 helpful staff, and large pool with sunning deck, you will find Breezy Oaks RV Park to be your home away from home. We have a spacious and well-designed park located in Bushnell, FL, we are pet-friendly and offer full-hookup 30 and 50 amp service. Our full service sites are perfect for hooking up your home-be it short term or long term stays. Come join us today. We are your new home away from home. You will be glad you did! Breezy Oaks RV Park is a Bushnell FL RV Park conveniently located right off of I-75 (Exit 309) in Bushnell, Florida surrounded by the Beautiful Withlacoochee State Forest and located within forty minutes of Orlando and Tampa. ADA Disclaimer: Please note, some of our facilities are not currently ADA-Compliant. We are currently working towards this future goal. We are sorry for any inconvenience. Bushnell FL RV Park Reserve Your Stay With Us Today! Give us a call to book your stay with Breezy Oaks RV Park… 352-569-0300 Breezy Oaks RV Park Rates All Sites: *Standard : Sites 1 – 164 (includes high speed internet hardwired to your site). *Premium : New, larger sites 165 – 217 (includes high speed internet hardwired to your site). *All sites are full hook-up 30/50 AMP. Rate includes Cable TV, Internet access, use of amenities. *Electric billed separately on monthly sites at 16 cents per KW. *Deposit : Monthly = 1 Month’s Rent .  Nightly and Weekly pay in full at time of reservation. Annual Sites: Standard Site = $549 (plus electric) . Premium Sites = $649 (plus electric). 7 Month Winter Special (October 1 – April 30): Standard Site = $649 (plus electric). Premium Sites = $749 (plus electric). Requires paying for all 7 months (regardless of how many months you are here). *No exceptions. *$50 Monthly . On your site storage available with 7-month special. Weekly: Winter Rates – Oct 1-April 30 – $399 (includes electric). Summer Rates – May 1-Sep 30 – $199 (includes electric). Monthly: October 1 – April 30: Standard Sites = $849 (plus electric). Premium Sites = $949 (plus electric). May 1 – September 30: Standard Sites = $599 (plus electric). Premium Sites = $699 (plus electric). Nightly (includes electric): Summer Rates – $54.95 ($49.95 after $5 discount). Winter Rates – $71.95 ($64.95 after $7 discount). Notes: **No refunds for early departure** Book Now! Fill Out Our Long-Term Stay Reservation Form! Required Form for Customers Interested in Staying 30 Days or More. Open Form Breezy Oaks RV Park Amenities DOG PARK & PICNIC AREA HEATED POOL FREE WI-FI/CABLE (CERTAIN AREAS) ON-SITE LAUNDRY CLEAN SHOWERS & BATHROOMS BIG RIG FRIENDLY LARGE PULL-THROUGH SITES PICNIC TABLES (FIRST COME, FIRST SERVED) 55+ EASY IN & OUT ON-SITE PROPANE SITE STAFFED 24/7 SOCIAL ACTIVITIES CONVENIENT LOCATION (JUST OFF I-75) FRIENDLY & HELPFUL STAFF & MUCH MORE! View Park Brochure Bushnell FL RV Park Map Please Click Image To View Larger Bushnell FL RV Park Image Gallery Click any of the Park images below to view larger. Reserve Your Stay With Us Today! Give us a call to book your stay with Breezy Oaks RV Park… 352-569-0300 Visit Our Sister Park Travelers Campground Learn More Our Park Reviews Here’s what our happy campers have to say about our park: On the spot! It was raining and dark. We had NO reservation, but when we pulled into the park (happily) there was someone there to help us. We only stayed 2 nights, but I would definitely stay there again! We were going to the Webster Flea Market but we had no car. John, one of your residents, offered to take us and pick us up. That was above and beyond. Thank you all! Mary S , From TripAdvisor Good location! However, what makes it special is the staff! They are very friendly and hospitable. I am looking forward to going back for a visit. They go out of there way to give you the feeling of home. G Richman, Retired, US Army , From TripAdvisor My husband and I have lived full-time in our RV since 2012. We love it. Breezy Oaks RV Park is a sweet place to live that truly always has a breezy. It is next to I-75 which makes it super easy for shopping and our favorite restaurant. We love this park. Friendly campers and a great park to live in. Prices are perfect, too! Shelley D , From TripAdvisor Most Accommodating. We had some mechanical problems with our truck, which was pulling a 5th wheel. Jim came and towed us to Breezy Oaks RV Park. We liked the park so much we stayed there 11 days. The park is well kept with full hookups. They have just added new spaces, which are wide and comfortable. Jan F , From TripAdvisor My husband and I are fulltimers since 2000 and have the age to be a “permanent” in this wonderful park. It fits all our expectations for a home place. We live here since May 2015 and we hope that our health allows us many, many years to call this resort our home. Our Thanks goes to the manager and to the new owners, who are very nice. The residents are super-friendly, too. Karin B , From Facebook Great park. Really easy access to the highway. New owner has bought the park and they are doing a bunch of work around the park and upgrades. Great people in the park. Room to roam around. Nice country feel. Really enjoying the stay here. Definitely recommend. J Slifer , From Facebook We have loved this park from day one when we arrived in 2003. When we come here to escape the cold & snowy winters, we leave our families in various states & even Canada. It makes it much easier to come “home” to our winter family. There are many nice folks that come back every year. Great karaoke, jams, & potluck dinners,too. Hopefully Jr. & I will be able to come back many, many more winters. M Rister , From Facebook Reserve Your Stay With Us Today! Give us a call to book your stay with Breezy Oaks RV Park… 352-569-0300 With updated amenities, complimentary WiFi & Cable (certain areas), a friendly and 24/7 helpful staff, and large pool with sunning deck, you will find Breezy Oaks RV Park to be your home away from home. We have a spacious and well-designed 55+ park, we are pet-friendly and offer full-hookup 30 and 50 amp service. RV Park located in Bushnell, FL. River Oaks RV Resort in Ruskin, FL Skip to content Spaces and lot rent specials available for first responders, insurance adjusters in efforts to help with the recovery from Helene and Milton. Home Facilities Area Attractions Photo Gallery Home Facilities Area Attractions Photo Gallery Rates Park Map Directions Rates Park Map Directions Book Now Home Facilities Area Attractions Photo Gallery Rates Park Map Directions Home Facilities Area Attractions Photo Gallery Rates Park Map Directions Contact Us RV Park Destination Welcome To River Oaks RV Resort A family owned & operated 50+ RV Park on the Florida Gulf Coast BOOK A SITE NOW Call Us Today : 813-645-2439 SCROLL Location Ruskin, Florida Timing Open Year Round Sites 115 Sites Price Range Starting @ $50/night Pet-Friendly, Florida Gulf Coast RV Resort Living A Terrific Tampa / St Pete / Bradenton / Sarasota RV Park With our central location, just 25 miles from Tampa & Sarasota, RVing along Florida’s west coast at River Oaks is convenient to a wide variety of area attractions. We’re just minutes away from spectacular Clearwater Beach. For golfers, there is a new golf course within two miles of our park and over 50 courses within a 30-minute drive. For our residents with pets, we have a dog park within walking distance of the resort. For those who like to stay back and relax, fish or crab right from our pier, or simply soak up the Florida sun. BOOK A SITE NOW About RV Resort Living Nestled among moss-covered oak trees along the scenic Little Manatee River, our family-owned Ruskin, Florida RV park is the perfect place to relax. You’ll love our pristine riverfront location, picturesque atmosphere, and welcoming community of friends. A small, quiet riverfront community, where you can fish & crab from our pier. World-class fishing on Tampa Bay is only 4 miles by water, so bring your boat, canoe, kayak, or paddleboard along and you can launch it nearby at our multiple launching sites. Things To Enjoy Enjoy Little Manatee River You’ll never feel as peaceful as you do sitting on the pier of Little Manatee River, just steps from your site. Florida Gulf Coast Resort Environment Whether you’re coming to escape winter or start your adventure, you’ll love Florida weather. Big 50-amp Full Hook-up Sites We are big-rig friendly with spacious sites ready to accommodate your RV of any size. Terrific Community Activites We’re not just a destination, but a community. Reconnect with friends and meet some new ones. Clubhouse Have friends and family over in our comfortable clubhouse. Don’t worry about fitting into your space, use ours! Fish & Crab Right From Our Pier Florida’s freshest seafood is available right at your doorstep, whether as a hobby or preparing a meal for friends. Join Our Great 50+ Community A Terrific Ruskin, FL RV Park Destination You’ll love our great facilities, including 30/50-amp full hook-ups, concrete patios, and free Wi-Fi. You’ll also appreciate our clean restrooms & showers and modern laundry facility. Of course our most desirable amenity of all is our beautiful waterfront location directly on the Little Manatee River. At River Oaks RV Resort you’ll receive a warm and personal welcome from our resident managers and staff. We pride ourselves on our quaint, friendly atmosphere & thoughtful service and strive to make your stay both pleasurable and memorable. BOOK A SITE NOW 50 Golf Courses within 30 minutes RUSKIN WEATHER Ruskin, FL, USA Ruskin, Florida Attractions: Golf Courses Enjoy more than 50 golf courses within a 30-minute drive of River Oaks Rv Resort. Restaurants Try something new, or enjoy an old favorite at a nearby restaurant. Ask at the front desk for a recommendation and we’ll help you find the tastes you’re looking for. What to do near Ruskin, FL There are so many attractions near our RV Resort along Florida’s West Coast , that you might just need a little help sorting through it all. Whatever fun activities you decide to pursue, we’re the perfect Florida Gulf Coast RV park home base. Outdoor & Adventure Manatee Viewing, boating and fishing are all within an arm’s reach. Tampa & Orlando Just 20 miles to Tampa, and 95 miles to Orlando will put you in the center of all the action, with a comfortable home base to come back to at night. Family Fun The fun only begins when you arrive at our Florida RV Resort. Meet new friends at Seaworld, visit Walt Disney World or Universal Studios, or go for a drive and discover an adventure! We’ll save a site for you! Relax with your RV on Florida’s Gulf Coast. About Us | Bending Oaks Ranch RV Resort | Fredericksburg top of page Home why 21 plus Rates Amenities Gallery About Us Attractions Map Contact Us More Use tab to navigate through the menu items. Where Comfort Meets Country! EXCLUSIVELY 21 YEARS AND OLDER ​ WELCOME TO BENDING OAKS RANCH RV PARK NEW LOWER RATES Located in the heart of the Texas Hill Country, this beautiful RV park is within a few short miles of the area's best attractions. Exclusive shopping, art galleries, elegant dining and the famous National Museum of the Pacific War await you in Fredericksburg. ​ Nestled in the heart of the Texas wine country, two miles from Wildseed Farms and Fredericksburg Trade Days, four miles from Luckenbach and town and across the road from Altstadt Brewery, you can't help but enjoy our area! You'll find tons of award-winning wineries with tours and tasting rooms close to this RV resort...even some within walking distance! After all the activity, return to your serene campsite - surrounded by grand old oak trees - and rest up for the next day's fun! We're proud to offer you a country atmosphere with star-filled nights. Meet our Longhorns and get your breakfast eggs straight from our yard girls! ​ All that and on nice evenings, we even have some local artists perform for us on our stage. We've been known to have a few big names too! Rick Trevino, Bellamy Brothers, John Conley, Buddy Jewell. ​ We love to have fun and would love for you to be a part of it! ​ ​ RESERVE NOW Open All Year Reserve: 830-997-4796 Info: 830-997-4796 5681 East US Highway 290 Fredericksburg, TX 78624 info@bendingoaksranch.com © Bending Oaks Ranch RV Resort LLC. ​ Accessibility bottom of page

Wonders never cease on the Choctawhatchee Bay—minutes from the country’s finest beaches in South Walton, Co, Florida. At Live Oak Landing, you’ll find diverse, world-class fishing, oak-studded trails, picture-perfect views, easy access and upscale amenities. MORE INFO On-Site Amenities: Saline Swimming Pool Boat Rentals Children’s Playground Event Pavilions Discover What We Offer Frequently Asked Questions What kind of RV sites do you have? We offer both back-in and pull-through big-rig friendly sites. What is your cancellation policy? We offer our “ Peace of Mind ” rate, which, with 72-hours notice prior to your arrival is fully refundable and less than a 10% cancellation fee except during holiday periods. In addition, we also offer our “Best Available” rate, which is set in stone with no changes or cancellations. You will be given the option to choose between the two rates at the time of booking. Is there a minimum night stay requirement? Only during holidays, there is a 3-night minimum and all reservations are non-refundable: Memorial Day, 4th of July, and Labor Day. How do I request a specific site or area? Please give us a call at (877) 436-5063 and we will do our best to accommodate your request. Is it pet friendly? What breeds? Yes, we are a pet-friendly property (dogs and cats only). Please visit our Pet Policy page for complete details. We have a strict pet leash policy to protect all guests and pets. Pets must be leashed at all times while on property. This is one of the biggest violations we encounter with our guests. As far as breed restrictions, we don’t necessarily have any. Any guest in violation of pet policies will be fined and/or asked to leave, regardless of the pet’s breed. Do you sell cottages? Yes, we offer options for cottage ownership! Ownership is exactly what it means—true ownership of the unit (unlike a timeshare). This is a better, more flexible and more affordable way to have a second home—while you also benefit from rentals. If you are interested in learning more, please complete a contact form here . Plan your visit to Live Oak Landing today!
